nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows contract owner to set the ZOI issuing authority.
@param _zoiIssuer address of ZOI issuing authority.
nodes.name: setZoiIssuer
issueZoi

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns amount of ZOI issued.
nodes.name: zoiIssued

nodes.documentation:
@notice Burns all tokens from msg.sender.
@param _amount number of tokens for burning
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
@notice Burns a specific amount of tokens. owner can burn only if user bought tokens not with ether
@param _address address of token's owner
nodes.name: burnFrom
burnBase
transferFrom
transfer
approve
balanceOf
allowance

nodes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value, it is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
nodes.name: increaseApproval
